title: Feature Branch Workflow with Pull Request
description: Complete feature development workflow from branch to merge

attack_chain.title: Create Feature Branch
attack_chain.explanation: Create and switch to new feature branch

attack_chain.title: Make Code Changes
attack_chain.command: echo 'def authenticate_user(): pass' > auth.py && git add auth.py

attack_chain.title: Add More Commits
attack_chain.command: echo 'import hashlib' >> auth.py && git commit -am 'Add password hashing'

attack_chain.title: Fetch Latest Changes
attack_chain.explanation: Get updates from remote main branch

attack_chain.title: Rebase on Main
attack_chain.explanation: Integrate latest main changes into feature

attack_chain.title: Push Feature Branch
attack_chain.expected_output: Branch 'feature/user-authentication' set up to track remote branch

attack_chain.title: Create Pull Request
attack_chain.command: gh pr create --title 'Add user authentication' --body 'Implements login/logout functionality' --base main --head feature/user-authentication

attack_chain.title: Merge After Approval
attack_chain.explanation: Squash commits and merge to main
